website_summaries.verdict: An flexible food slicer with adjustable thickness.
pros: High-quality cheese slicer that can be used on any other foods as well since it uses a blade instead of a wire
Ergonomic aluminum handle makes it easy to use
cons: No locking mechanism on the very sharp blade, so you have to be careful where you store it

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a joke. I felt like I bought some kids fake kitchen product. I immediately returned it. It doesn’t cut at all and is so flimsy. Completely over priced for junk. I’m not sure how others are leaving good reviews for this. But that’s a no from me.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: It's ugly, and sucks at the only thing it does.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a solid hour looking at reviews of wire cheese cutters, because I love the aesthetic. I hate to introduce another unitasker to my kitchen countertop, but a knife is slow and the handheld cheese cutters aren't a lot better. Every single wire-based cheese cutter is terribly reviewed. I thought, perhaps, the excellent reviews on this one, despite its hideous plastic base, meant that it would cut cheese amazingly. It does not. Picture attached. I will be disposing of it entirely once I post this review. Thank you for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Piefayth

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BOTHER! SLICER SMASH!
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it a negative if possible. There must be one special kind of cheese this is designed for, but apparently not one that I usually serve. I was hoping to be able to more accurately slice for presentation and really liked the ability to adjust slicing width. However, the "knife" barely cut into cheddar weight cheeses and a small summer sausage beforing starting to smash them apart in mid slice, making this product useless for its designated purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Cats

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionized my Cheese-n-Sausage Game.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a champ - it's completely revolutionized my cheese and sausage game. The adjustable stop block is terrific; you can really speed through a block of cheese or a long summer sausage with clean and consistent cuts. I've only used it a handful of times so I can't vouch for its long-term durability, but at just over $20 you really just can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: LeffelMania

customer_reviews.title: You want a slicer?  Get this one.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PUT THIS IN THE DISHWASHER. I purchased this to replace (2) cheese slicers that were wire and could not hold up to our usage. This lovely device slices bread, meat, sausage, hard and soft cheese, and it's nice and neat. Use the measurement gauge on the left, and the little red tab to the right of the blade adjusts the width of the item cut. It's almost like having a deli slicer in my kitchen. My bro sliced some very lean pork loin in to sandwiches. It was a thing of beauty. So, whether you are making art, crudite, sandwiches, or just slicing for your amusement, you won't find a better slicer for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Abacuskat

customer_reviews.title: Westmark Germany Multipurpose Stainless Steel Cheese and Food Slicer with Board and Adjustable Thickness
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Westmark Germany Multipurpose Stainless Steel Cheese and Food Slicer with Board and Adjustable Thickness Dial ASIN: B004W7GRG8 Item model number: 70002260. I received the slicer in the mail. I was excited to open the package & see my new product. Then...sigh... The blade is damaged. Brand new product? Hmm. This slicer needs to go in the trash. And not possibly making its way to another consumer. I should not waste my time returning the slicer. I find it hard to believe that a German manufacturer would send this to a consumer. I have a Borner V Slicer from the 70s that is in better shape. I returned this slicer for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Moey

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced... I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The expensive GERMAN cheese slicer shipped out and arrived on time. The blade looks terrible. It's got a chip in and looks wrinkled from one end to the other. Got it to put up for Christmas. I hate to return items. But seriously thinking about sending this back. I would not recommend at all......
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Can't quite cut the cheese
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was advertised as a good cheese cutter, and for whatever reason finding a wire cheese cutter on Amazon is ridiculously difficult. This cutter has sharp blade , but because it is solid, the resistance of the blade is too great to make it through a firm or crumbly cheese, like a Gruyere for example. Cleanup is also a pain because the cheese particles get stuck on the blade surface, which is not one piece but made up of metal blade affixed to a plastic lever, creating another point of resistance. It is much better for things like cucumbers, carrots, zucchini, etc .
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money for a higher quality slicer
customer_reviews.text: Was very underimpressed. This product came up when I entered "salami slicer". Nope that did not work at all. Tried cheese, nope, unless the cheese is super firm it just smooshed it. Cheaply made. Kind of like a toy paper cutter. I returned it the day after receiveing it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Embrey

customer_reviews.title: This slicer will effortless do what the others can only claim to do.
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of broken wires and went shopping for a good cheese slicer...and found it. I read all the reviews and all the Q&A's before I bought this slicer, I received my slicer today and had to try it out. I found a new one pound package of Kraft Cheddar cold in my frig and started to work. Because the scale is in metric I had to make one small adjustment before I had just the right thickness. I could have sliced the whole one pound block in a few minutes...far better than I could do with a knife. Each slice was perfect with no crumbs, brakes or goo.
customer_reviews.author: J Lochaby

customer_reviews.title: Does not cut cheddar cheese smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the way this slicer cuts cheddar cheese. I wanted to cut a block of Kerry Gold Irish Cheddar into nice even slices, but the result was ugly and choppy (see photo). I think the blade was not sharp enough. I know that this particular cheddar is hard and dry, but I think a sharp blade should make a clean cut through it. I am sending this slicer back. Maybe I got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: J. Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing since...well...sliced cheese!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this device! Not only because it looks just like a small paper cutter, but because it works like a charm! I keep sliced meat and cheese (as well as mounds of veggies) in the fridge for snacking and, frankly, I didn't look forward to the weekly of slicing Thuringer and cheese to put into little baggies. I have carpal tunnel and essential tremor so I was constantly letting my hands rest after cutting uneven slices. NO MORE! I cut through 2 blocks of cheese and a foot of Thuringer in about 5 minutes. No hand pain - I kissed this little machine (avoiding the blade, of course!)
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality i expected that company
customer_reviews.text: I have some products of that company for many years, and they are good quality. So when I saw this device, I decided to buy as an instant help in the kitchen. I am very disappointed with the product, all food that I tried to cut was squashed. And the blow of the unpleasant guillotine. I will try again and if I am still disappointed I will consider giving back.
customer_reviews.author: One lady

customer_reviews.title: If your in the market this is the one
customer_reviews.text: I totally hate wire cheese cutters, they are hard to clean and ive had the wire come loose. This one has a steel blade. And the thickness gauge is amazing. It can make cheese paper thin or as thick as you want it. Cuts ups salami also, so cheese and meat cut all at once with the same device. I also use this to slice apples and pears for my son, its almost the only way he will eat them now. I bought one for my family and after my mom used it (and loved it) i bought her one. Definitely the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Captain awesome

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY a cheese cutter that WORKS and is super durable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is not dainty in any way..and using the old cheese cutters with wires was not working for him. He'd constantly be needing to replace those wires and they were a pain in the butt to replace. WE FINALLY found what we've been looking for! THis is it! we love this product and it is so easy to use, clean, and store. The old cheese cutters had one thickness. This has a dial you can adjust. You can also use this for so many other things. It's great...really really great!
customer_reviews.author: super critical shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Cheese Slicer Ever
customer_reviews.text: Have owned many many cheese slicers and they always break or are difficult to use. The Westmark Germany Multipurpose Stainless Steel Cheese and Food Slicer with Board and Adjustable Thickness is the best ever. It is so durable, so easy to use and so easy to change thickness of the slices. Hard cheese, soft cheese - no problem at all. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cheese!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slicer to cut cheddar cheese for cheese and crackers, and it does a perfect job. So, I bought a second one to use for snacks at work. I only gave it 4 stars for two reasons: It's very light-weight, so you need to hold it in place while using it; and it does not work well for summer sausage, preferring to smash instead of slice. The blade depth is only about 1⁄8" before getting to the arm taper, which is probably why it tries to smash the summer sausage. I have not tried it with vegetables or anything else. But, if you want it for cheese, this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Not up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: Not up to expectations for the price. I could slice cheese, or Spam loaf, but slices are not all of uniform thickness. The blade can move from side to side and requires the operator to take some care so that the slices are of the same thickness. Maybe that will improve with an improvement in my skill in using the slicer. Nor is it as sturdy as I expected. Important! Be very careful to avoid the sharp blade when cleaning. It could give you a nasty cut if you're not careful. Possibly a slicer with a wire cutter rather than a blade cutter would be safer. I'll continue to use it but will continue looking for a better slicer.
customer_reviews.author: David Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this cheese slicer. We previously had another type of cheese slicer that used a wire to slice the cheese; however, after a year or so of light use, the wire broke. We bought another slicer by the same mfr, but the wire was not fully tightened and didn't slice through the cheese fully. That was when we decided to try the westmark slicer. We love this one (this is 2nd, which we purchased as a gift for a good friend). Some reviewers have stated that they did not think the thickness guide worked properly but we have had zero issues with it. The westmark slicer works flawlessly and we are very satisfied with it. Most strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Saltydawg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today, I decided to look for something that would slice little block cheeses, because no matter what knife i used i got not get the slice thin enough to melt on top of something it would either stick to the knife or the cheese slice would spit. Then i saw this and read the reviews, I absolutely LOVE IT, now i can slice the cheese as thin as i want or as thick as I want. Well worth the price! On the box it says it has a 5 year warranty but there is no paper work with it. So I guess I will just go to the manufacturer’s website to register the product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Beil

customer_reviews.title: "Made in Germany so you know it's good!"
customer_reviews.text: "Made in Germany so you know it's good!" It's true in this case! Blade is Extremely sharp so be careful. I like the adjustability using the knob on the left. One thing I would wish it had was the "stopper" thingy on the right side (Under the blade) That stops the cheese from sliding could be better in my opinion. That stopper thing is way too short it needs to extend all the way to the front of the unit because of large cheese block from Tiliamook doesn't quite fit. But I'm able to get it working well enough. Overall great slicer!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene35

customer_reviews.title: Best slicer ever created ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! I absolutely love it..It cuts everything in no time at all. I cut up 4 bell peppers in less than 3 minutes. It cuts my cheese perfectly..but I was most impressed wit the way it cuts up vegetables.. So easy to use and to clea. It has a bar on the side so that you cut everything perfectly the same size every time, it’s awesome...I would definitely recommend this to everyone...
customer_reviews.author: Donald Corkum

customer_reviews.title: A great little cheese (or veggie) slicer
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through a number of cheese slicers with the wire, and found that they frequently broke, or the wire would get too loose to work properly. I was determined to find SOMETHING that would work better, and I came across this. I have not regretted buying it. It can be manually adjusted to the thickness size you want, and it works very well. It's also easy to clean. I recommend this slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Ladnier

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheeses, not so much for meats
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for cheeses, I used it to slice tillamook cheddar and it sliced it deli thin, however I also tried to use it to slice some salami, however it did not work at all and just tore into the meat rather than slicing it. If you are looking for something to slice cheeses than this is perfect, however if you are looking for something to slice salami or meats, than I would recommend trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Nima Saba

customer_reviews.title: This works way better than you'd guess
customer_reviews.text: This guy is sharp, though it might not look that way. And so it can make very nice slices of what I would call difficult cheeses. It's also very strong, which helps too. I plan to use this for a lot more than cheese. It would make quick work of vegetables for instance. It's easy to clean too. You will want to put it on something to catch the slices, such as a cutting board or plate.
customer_reviews.author: rjg

customer_reviews.title: Different and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love it....i always buy the wire type and they just don't live up to the hype. When I saw the way this worked I decided to try it. I love how easy it is to use and how great it cuts. The fact that you cancutother vegetables and fruits also is a huge plus! I give it two enthusiastic thumbs up. The only thing is I don't know if the blade can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: carla lisa villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Love this cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this slicer! This is so easy to use. It has sliced through every kind of cheese so far with ease. Hard to soft. Love that I don't have to worry about the string breaking. Extremely easy to clean too. I just regret not buying it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy slicing
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the wire slicers and dreaded getting another one. The wires never cut a perfect thickness or even straight (my fault! LOL). I saw this paper cutter style cheese slicer and thought I would give it a try. It is perfect. We usually get a block of Gouda. I have been slicing off it without waste. The slicer is easy to use and looks like it will be around for quite awhile. Glad I purchased this. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Carol

customer_reviews.title: The first one is great but . . . .
customer_reviews.text: The first one is great but when we received the second one for a different kitchen it cuts crooked. The blade arm is not in alignment with the cutting base. That is only a problem with the first piece of cheese but it is 1/16th of an inch on the hinge side and zero on the other side. If someone from the seller doesn't contact me I'll have to fix it (or break it) myself. Did I mention that the first one was great? It cuts soft cheese and some pretty hard cheese with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Irv

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!  Use carefully
customer_reviews.text: I really like the slice thickness stop gauge to make uniform thickness slices. Although with large pieces of soft cheeses the cheese may tend to distort giving an uneven slice thickness. I also use it to slice other veggies when a uniform thickness s desired cucumbers, carrots etc. I also use it for cutting pepperoni from a stick (much better than the pre-sliced stuff). Positives: thickness gauge, ease of use and blade sharpness. Negatives: large chunks of soft cheese a bit unwielding. Positive and negative: Blade sharpness cuts great, but be careful, the blade is very sharp I cut my finger the first time washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and we'll built but no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product it seems to work well and well constructed. It didn't have instructions with it so I'm not sure if I'm using it right so I docked a star for that. It has a little turning knob on one end and a little window showing measurements but it doesn't seem to do anything but I haven't really took the time to think about it much I just push the cheese off the edge so I have different thicknesses sliced. I have only used it to slice cheese, but I'm sure it would work well for cucumbers, carrots etc. Overall I'm pleased with it and I have used it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Owen

customer_reviews.title: First Rate Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that in order to have any success slicing cheese you must cut it at room temperature. At room temperature this slicer does an excellent job. The blade is sharp and much more durable than the typical wire slicer. We love the cheese slice thickness adjustment. The only upgrade I would recommend is a little sturdier base. This one is plastic and does not compare with the marble base of the slicer we are replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Voltmer

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient slicer for cheese or meat
customer_reviews.text: The knife edge on this slicer works better than the thin wire most slicers use. It's easy to use, and easy to clean. It seems to be well made, and should last a long time. It works pretty much like slicing things with a knife, but improves over a knife by having a thickness adjuster, which allows you to make each cut the exact same thickness. I would recommend these to anyone, especially if you like to make pretty party snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Day

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great
customer_reviews.text: Primarily use for cutting cheese. After reading some reviews, it sounded like it was not sharp enough or would have difficulty cutting harder cheeses. This thing has been working great. My cheese slicer with the cutting wire (that break often) is headed for the trash. This new cutter is very light - makes it seem cheap and maybe less durable - but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best. Cheese. Slicer. Ever! Hands down best buy in a long time. We kept buying those stupid wire cheese slicers and they kept breaking plus it's hard to get uniform slices with those wire slices. This is durable, easy to use and makes excellent slices, slice after slice.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyamee

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese slicer out there
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely crazy with kitchen gadgets. I love to try everything and this cheese slicer by far is the best I’ve ever used. You can adjust it incredibly thin or thick depending on your preference. You end up with a perfect slice every time without anything breaking off like others Ive tried. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted it to do!
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about this slicer. The only thing I would suggest to the manufacturer would be to put a removable shield on the blade. The blade is VERY sharp! Great for cutting meats and cheeses. I will solve this by getting a short length of plastic hose, slicing it down the middle and placing it on the blade when storing it. Quick, easy and inexpensive fix. Love the adjustable measuring gauge which allows consistent size slice. Washes up easily and it lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could buy bulk cheese and slice it up myself rather than paying extra for sliced cheese. It works for what I do, though depending on the cheese if you slice it too thin the cheese crumbles. The device, however works great. I'm sure I'll think of many other things to use it for! Great, simplistic design!
customer_reviews.author: Capashops

customer_reviews.title: Good for slicing paper and thin cheese
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of crumbling up any cheese you want. Makes any cheese look like bleu cheese after you cut it. Essentially the blade is too thin and the angled handle shreds the cheese into small pieces if the piece of cheese is thicker than 2-3cm (1 inch)
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool, but because it has a very sharp exposed blade one must be extremely conscientious of the blades location. The blade is slightly exposed even when not in use due to a spring loaded device at the pivot point near the blades anchoring to the frame. When not in use I store the unit with a large rubber band around the blade and framework to keep the blade hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kopan

customer_reviews.title: Stop using the wires! This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We are big cheese lovers living in the heart of “cheese country” Wisconsin and have been cutting with the wires and a granite block for years. I read reviews on this cheese cutter which got better reviews than the wire kind. We are not sorry we bought this! It’s amazing! The knife part is SUPER sharp so be careful! The little gauge that you can adjust cuts the cheese the exact thickness you want. I would buy this again and will recommend to anyone! Love love love this cheese cutter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Slicin n Dicin -but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Does at it claims. However, with hard or semihard cheezes, you may not get a completely even cut (Cheddar, for example). No easy way to wash it and the blade looks like it could rust. Must wash it by hand. Be VERRy careful with the blade. As others have already said, there should be some way to secure the blade in a locked position. Otherwise I like the cutter
customer_reviews.author: ErikDaViking

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller and especially square/rectangular pieces of cheese
customer_reviews.text: Great for smaller and especially square/rectangular pieces of cheese. Not so much for larger wedges that Jarlsberg cheese comes in (2.5 lbs). The length of the knife is not large enough and the edge of the cheese is being sliced with a plastic part, so it crumbles the cheese. Also, again with large wedges, the thickness of the slices is not consistent, which should not be a problem with rectangular cheese chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy product and the dial gives you the ability to easily adjust the width of the slices. The blade is good quality and sharp. The surface of the slicer helps hold that cheese in place so it's a breeze to use. This is SO much better than the cheese cutters that use wires. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with one of the spot welds broken that holds the blade onto the arm. The result is a gap where cheese gets stuck. The photo shows the gap and even though it was washed for an number of minutes, cheese is still stuck. I would have returned the cutter except the box was gone and I did not notice the problem until the first use. I normally think German products will be well made, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Snelling

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a cheese slicer that works. After trying a couple of wire-based slicers that produced uneven slices, broken wires and frustration trying to install new wires I spent the extra money to buy this. Well worth it. The blade is sharp, cuts smoothly and will last for many years. Only wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Guy

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!!
customer_reviews.text: Wondered when it first came...base is plastic but woo hoo does it slice cheese!! Thickness of slice bar is adjustable. I have gone through many items with the wire and they don’t come close to how good this is. My first slice was with a hard cheese and it went threw like butter. I didn’t rate durability as I have only had it a few days but it has to last longer than the wire kind.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a cheese cutter that works. Wire slicers last about two weeks and the wire breaks. I went through several and was disgusted with all. The only thing I would recommend would be a blade cover when not in use and for safe handling until you actually are ready to slice cheese.
customer_reviews.author: johnson

customer_reviews.title: not that impressed
customer_reviews.text: the movable part that slices moves around a bit so the cuts are not consistent. the edge around the blade gets a lot of gunk built up because there should not be an edge there. I wanted a cheese slicer that would also cut other things. i don't recommend slicing any cheese with this one. This product would only be good for slicing veggies maybe and they cannot be very big and you have to be alright with inconsistent cuts (even though you can measure your cuts.) Not worth the around $30 i paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Soda's

customer_reviews.title: Glad I gave this cheese slicer a chance
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected, Was looking at the regular cheese slicers with the wire as that is what I have had experience with before but as others say they are usually cheaply made and the wire breaks easily. Saw this while browser and took a chance after reading reviews although I was skeptical somewhat as I thought it looked too small but it is just right, cuts a large block of cheese easily. Feels very sturdy and the blade is very sharp. Glad I took a chance on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Just a sinner saved by grace

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the cheese slice as a crumbled mess.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but it does a terrible job of cutting hard cheeses such as cheddar. No matter what thickness it is set at it causes the slice to fall apart. The blade design is far too thick. A standard wire cutter slicer is far better.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Finally; a cheese slicer that doesn't use a wire.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheese slicer that I have been looking for, for years. I wasn't aware that there even is a slicer that doesn't use a wire, but decided to check 'one more time', after another wire broke. I have had this slicer for a week or so, and have happily used it every day. It is just like it is described, but even more so. I like that the slices can be made thinner or thicker; it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: WCR

customer_reviews.title: Dull blade
customer_reviews.text: I see it as an improvement over wire cutters but the one I got does not have a razor sharp blade. It works fine on soft cheese but I can see where sausage will be a problem. The blade has a burr on it that needs to be removed but I'm not sure if I have a fine enough stone to do it. I know what would work but it would cost almost as much as the slicer did. The rest of the machine is all light plastic which is great for cleaning and drying but it won't take rough treatment. Worth the money as is but it would have been nice to have some quality control on the knife.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. leeTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Good cheese cutter.
customer_reviews.text: Turned the dial to move the blade to the thickness I wanted, and got consistent sized slices. Cheese doesn't stick to blade. Would have given a 5 star rating, exit for the seemingly cheap plastic base. I expect higher quality from a German manufacturer. Have not tried cutting meats or other items yet. Will update my rating when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Huggy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Multi-slicer
customer_reviews.text: The ease of clean-up is fantastic, especially after cutting other than cheese. The advertisement displayed other items that this cutting mechanism would be able to slice, so we decided to try it on other items. The cheese sliced well and the other items (zucchini, celery, summer sausage, hard salami, and even a decent slice of tomato) sliced were able to be cut at a thickness that fit the bill for what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B. Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese slicer!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this cheese slicer! I buy the large 1 lb. bricks of cheese and this slicer makes it so much easier slice and and more uniform slices. It doesn’t take near as long as slicing with a regular knife. I really like it and plan on purchasing some as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels47

customer_reviews.title: Consistent slices, messy with hard cheddars.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Consistent slice size (3mm, 5mm). Unfortunately, extra sharp cheddar flakes easily and was more of a mess than when using my ceramic knife. As other reviews have said, cleanup is an issue because of the nooks and crannies, but under running hot water and using a bristle brush, it cleaned up. I'll have to try it with softer cheeses like swiss and mozzarella...
customer_reviews.author: Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Clean with brillo pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for slicing cheese. I gave it 4 stars because the first 3-4 slices of cheese had to be thrown away. They had grey deposits on them from the slicing blade even though I had washed it. After that, it worked quite well. Sure beats the wire slicers.
customer_reviews.author: Missie

customer_reviews.title: I will happily replace it with another Westmark
customer_reviews.text: The cutting blade is very sharp!, The thickness guide could be improved! Over all it is a big improvement over the wire blade cutters. I have used it twice, once for cutting cheese and once for cutting vegetables for salad, it worked well for both. If and when it breaks, I will happily replace it with another Westmark. HAVE A VERY MERRY CHRISTMAS AND A HAPPY NEW YEAR; G.P.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Protheroe

customer_reviews.title: excellent superb
customer_reviews.text: I love everything. wonderful!!! easy to use, cleaning is extremely easy, no complicated, good looking. only regret not buying before. deserves every dollar!!!! is an amazing way to optimize money on cheese and charcuterie. and improve portion control. as everything made in Germany sturdy quality mean to last decades.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut 8 oz. blocks of cheese into slices
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to cut slices from 8 oz. blocks of cheese that we keep in the fridge for snacks. We know you can use it for other items like veggies, but we love being able to slice cheese in various thicknesses by adjusting the size you like.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Schuff

customer_reviews.title: Has some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it slices foods fine. Major problem is you have to sit it on a box so food you are slicing has room to fall away from slicer, maybe adding adjustable legs would help especially if you are trying to cut thin slices.
customer_reviews.author: David Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Great products and great service!
customer_reviews.text: Cheese slicer worked well and was easy to set--also has a blade instead of wire cutter like most slicers have. Apple slicer works sell also. Shipment was was prompt and products in good shape. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Leland Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: The only improvement I would like to see is the cheese stop be firmer and longer as most blocks of cheese are at lest 2 inches longer than the current stop. The way it is the slices are not even end to end.
customer_reviews.author: TRHenderson

customer_reviews.title: EVEN I CAN SLICE A BIG CHEESE
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a cheese cutter for a long time. Over the years I have purchased several. None of them ever really worked to my satisfaction. I spotted this one, liked the concept that they were using and thought I would give it a try. To date , this cutter has been the best one I have ever bought. The thickness of the slice can be controlled and is adjustable. It cuts smoothly and consistently with little effort. It remains to be seen how durable it will be in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: ... this slicer mainly to slice salami and was very disappointed that it was not able to do so
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this slicer mainly to slice salami and was very disappointed that it was not able to do so. The description clearly states "Doubles as a Meat and Sausage Slicer". I tried it with soft and hard salamis, as well as cold and room temperature. The slice would slice partially and would end up tearing the salami and making mess. It may work fine as a cheese slicer, but I did not purchase it or test it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kalibr

customer_reviews.title: Consider a different product
customer_reviews.text: Does not preform as expected. Ad shows cutting meat but the blade only tears it no clean slice. It lacks a positive stop to help maintain consistent slices. Without a defined stop item being cut is hard to keep hold in place. Blade tends cause cheese to crumble.
customer_reviews.author: JTK

customer_reviews.title: A Cutter Above
customer_reviews.text: I have snapped dozens of wire strung slicers, bled from many potato peeler-like cutters and FINALLY here is a cheese cutter that really works. Simple design, safe, sturdy, this one has it all figured out (trust the Germans!).
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gillman

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slicer to create a cheese and meat tray for my son’s birthday party. It worked very well for what I needed, though I do wish the guard were longer, as this would help with uniformity.
customer_reviews.author: B-Martin

customer_reviews.title: Your last cheese cutter!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several of the wire cheese cutters and being disappointed, we ordered this one and were impressed. At first glance you'd think it was not too impressive, but as soon as you start slicing cheese you will be convinced that this is very good. It slices cheese with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it
customer_reviews.text: We were not able to get it to cut cheese without it breaking it up into pieces. Maybe we are using it wrong but I don’t think so. We went back to the traditional wire slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work, after fixing the blade
customer_reviews.text: Several reviewers have commented that the blade arrived damaged. My order was no different. There were two locations on the blade where it had been damaged and folded over slightly. After using a honing rod, I was able to get the blade into a usable condition. I have tested it on a block of cheddar, and it seems to cut nicely. It is just a shame that the product arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cheese slicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cheese cutter that I have ever had. It is plastic, but it has a very sharp cutting edge. You can adjust the size of the slice. I do not recommend it for meats. When you think of a plastic cheese slicer, you think that it would be cheap—but it is great quality. I have given this exact slicer to six people in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Forget those wire cheese cutters - the wires break! This cutter has a razor-sharp blade that can cut through any cheese and many soft veggies. The adjustable slice thickness measuring screw works perfectly. (I prefer thin cheese slices at 2 mm.) The product packaging doesn't say if it's dishwasher-safe, but if you use dishwasher powder, don't do it. The powder grit will dull the blade over time, just like it will dull your finest knives. But be careful of that blade when you hand wash!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Best sliver around
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for some hard cheeses and some medium cheeses (holder's cheddar) and it worked beautifully for all. I especially like the dial-up in width settings that allow variable widths in the slices.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to manipulate.
customer_reviews.text: No tray to catch what you are trying to cut. Hard to handle without being very, very careful. Sorry I didn't send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it...... Cuts hard cheese super thin as you want, soft cheese a bit thicker and best if still cold, small vegetables celery, radishes, ring carrots etc.... Easy to clean and store. Use carefully fingers don't grow back. As a grandfather be careful around children in the area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good for slicing cheese. I have not tried it on vegetables as I got it mostly to slice cheese. I found that when attempting to slice summer sausage, it didn't cut as sharply as I had wished. It is very easy to clean and small, so it is easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST cheese slicer ever! I've always had such a tough time with knives and getting consistent cuts. Or with the wire cheese cutters, the wire always loosens and moves. This one has a sizing gauge and it stays in place exactly where you want it with little effort to slice. I had others try this because I was so excited and they also loved it. Very easy to clean as well. I'm buying some for presents this year. Would DEFINITELY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ky's mom

customer_reviews.title: not so good for sausages.
customer_reviews.text: works great w/ cheese. but w/ dried salami, soppressata, it doesn't work. it seems like they are too squishy to be cut. it does not cut into the salami, rather it pushes into the salami. I gave up using it on soppressata. if there is other tips, like maybe freezing the soppressata before slicing, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cutter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for slicing pretty much anything. If there were a way to remove the blade for cleaning, we would give it an enthusiastic 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Gerat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cheese slicer.. My Daughter-in-law got one and recommend that I buy one. It works best on hard cheese like Colby but it will work on softer cheese like Colby jack but the slices are not as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband got one a year ago and loves it. I got my son one this Christmas because he liked using his dad’s all the time.They like that you can pick the thickness of the meat/cheese your cutting. I would definitely give to people as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! It might be ok for zucchini or bananas but not for cheddar cheeses, can't keep it straight! Moves with the cutter blade too much!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Thornlow

customer_reviews.title: So far impressed with the performance
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and tried it on a cold block of Cheddar cheese, it slices it with eases, uniformly and faster then with a knife or wire slicer. Also sliced olives with it, very pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: George A Rieder Jr

customer_reviews.title: I will have this for many years
customer_reviews.text: I searched for about an hour before deciding to get a cheeseslicer and I finally decided on this one after reading all of the reviews. This slicer is a tank and does a fabulous job slicing cheese. It's work on other foods as well, but I just use it for cheese. I am sure I will have this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Gavaronee

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese straightener EVER!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who loves cheese, this is a MUST. Bought as a gift and have had to borrow on many occasions because it's just that awesome! Definitely do NOT regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Turtlekins

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to store, slices with blade not wire
customer_reviews.text: Love this slicer. Slices with a blade and not wire. Slices paper thin cheese and lightweight and easy to use and store. Love it and bought another to gift.
customer_reviews.author: BagnBasket.com

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work so well for harder cheese
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for soft cheese but doesn’t work for harder cheeses. See photos for what it does to sharp cheddar
customer_reviews.author: Bluto Blutarski

customer_reviews.title: Never knew how much I needed this until I got it
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd need a dedicated cheese-slicer, but boy was I wrong. I love how you can modulate the thickness of the slices. The blade is nice and sharp. Sturdy and easy to clean. Slicing cheese is only the beginning! I use it for hard meats and vegetables as well. I use it so often I never have to put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kojibaby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use slicer.
customer_reviews.text: Slicer has a blade instead of a wire that can stretch and break over time. Slicer works great and can slice up a block of cheese in no time. Slice thickness dial is easy to use and cleanup is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne D. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: German made, not China junk- SEE UPDATE*
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, German, not China junk. Update:9/13/17 although this unit IS well made, I have to downgrade it to 4 stars because of the way it cuts cheese. It does NOT produce a smove cut like a wire cheese cutter does on the cheese, the cheese (in this case cheddar) looks really rough. I have not yet tried to cut other things with it.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Practical
customer_reviews.text: We have been through many, the wire type cutters are the worst (they always break). This is so different! It works great & is super easy to use & clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with this tool, works amazing and easy to clean. Make a cheese plate all the and it cuts all different cheeses perfect and to the perfect size every time.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This product met my expectations. I've used it a couple of times since I purchased and I appreciate the ease with which I am now able to cut slices evenly.
customer_reviews.author: powerdump

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: I am kind of disappointed with this cheese cutter. I bought it because my mom has the same one and I absolutely loved it. The one I got on the other hand, doesn’t cut as nice. I just bought it a week or so ago and a part on the back had already fallen off and I can’t figure out where it came out from.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for harder cheeses!
customer_reviews.text: My block of Tillamook cheddar keep breaking the metal wire of the other cutters, but this one stands up. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JBH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this slicer/cutter. YES it will cut the 4" block of cheese from Sam's. I can not tell you how easy this has made the slicing. NOTE: the blade IS sharp. Be careful when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: replacement arrived quickly and works fine
customer_reviews.text: The replacement cutter arrived quickly and operates just fine. I purchased an egg slicer prior to this item and it also works very well. I think this maker is a good company and I look forward to buying other products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lake

customer_reviews.title: Blade edge is not straight and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Edge of blade seemed curled at the cutting edge and had to sharpen which only improved the cutting marginally. Overall it seemed to tear into cheese and vegetables rather than a nice cut. Great concept idea but just would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Johnson

product_meta.title: Westmark Germany Multipurpose Stainless Steel Cheese and Food Slicer with Board and Adjustable Thickness Dial (White) -
product_meta.description:
Color:MulticolorFeatures:
- High quality stainless steel blade
- Ergonomic aluminum handle
- Adjustable thickness scale
- ABS base

About the Brand:
HIGHEST QUALITY WITH TREND AND TRADITION! Westmark of Germany is well known for its quality craftsmanship of kitchen gadgets. Westmark has been making reliable kitchen products for over 50 years. As a specialized and reliable partner, Westmark offers a wide range of practical and uncomplicated kitchen products designed to make cooking and life in the kitchen easier. For traditional reasons, Westmark produces most of their products in Elspe, Germany. 

Money Back Guarantee: If you are not happy with our product, simply return the item to Amazon for a full refund, but we are confident that you will LOVE our product!
feature_bullets: MADE IN GERMANY HIGH QUALITY KITCHENWARE: Westmark’s Cheese and Food Slicer with Board is among the best in the world and is rated to be one of the best kitchenware brands available today.

MATERIAL: Each product is made using a high quality stainless steel blade and high quality cast aluminum for its handle. the base of the board is made from ABS with a polypropylene adjustable scale. See below for more details.

EASY AND READY TO USE: This easy to use product slices not only your soft and hard cheeses, but can also manage other food items such as sausages, peppers, cucumbers, radishes, lettuce and much more!Equipped with an ergonomic handle and a thickness adjustable scale, Westmark’s product is efficient and comfortable to use.
EASY TO CLEAN: Simply use soap and water to clean the product.
5 YEAR WARRANTY: Backed with a 5 year warranty, Westmark is completely confident that you will love their product or we will refund your money back, no questions asked!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,731 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
